Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/75th
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 71st, Vincennes, 75th and State, due to fire department activity near Lafayette/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 71st, Vincennes, 75th, then resume their normal route on State, due to fire department activity near Lafayette/75th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing in both directions due to an obstruction at Cicero. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing in both directions due to an obstruction at Cicero.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are have been requested between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
